entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issues with publishing and Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.dll #26694
  • [6.0][CosmosDB] DateTime with z suffix is not respected when reading entities. #26690
  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold doesn't respect -d option #26687
  • InMemory provider in EF Core 6 doesn't set value for Timestamp-fields #26686
  • ToSqlQuery method not working in 6.0.0 #26685
  • Translating this query requires the SQL APPLY operation, which is not supported on SQLite. #26684
  • Could not install package 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 6.0.0'. You are trying to install this package into a project that targets '.NETFramework,Version=v4.7.2', but the package does not contain any assembly references or content files that are compatible with that framework. For more information, contact the package author. #26683

Closed

  • Why is EFCore6 throwing NullReferenceException when adding entity/entities? It is working in EFCore5. #26644
  • Error in dotnet ef migrations add IdentityMigrations #26681
  • SqliteConnectionFactory.cs is not thread-safe #26612
  • update from 5.0.1 to 6.0breaks all SqliteConnection #26574
    6.0.x
  • Variable names must be unique within a query batch or stored procedure #26632
    6.0.x
  • Query with n:m relation adds non-existent column #26590
    6.0.x
  • Using Cosmos Db with EfCore and Managed Identity #26573
  • Use EqualsExact in DefaultDateTimeOffsetValueComparer #26672
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26698
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.22.1 to 3.23.0 #26693
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.3 to 8.0.4 #26692
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Release/5.0]Fix ValueGenerated, make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26691
  • Additional tests for Temporal tables #26682
  • Fix some markdown language syntax highlights #26680

Merged

  • [6.0.x] Query: Update table references in pushdown after moving table referen… #26700
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [6.0.1] Avoid infinite loop when finding principal in circular relationships #26699
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [6.0.1] Use read-write lock to protect concurrent pool accesses (#26658) #26697
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26695
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0.1] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Handle more nulls in ApplicationDataHelper #26637
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • Use a unique identifier for variables during insert #26679
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
  • [6.0.1] Use read-write lock to protect SQLite concurrent pool accesses #26658
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Revert SQLite concurrent pool access change #26696
  • Match indexer properties correctly #26645
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.x
  • Use EqualsExact in DefaultDateTimeOffsetValueComparer #26678
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Put parentheses around IS NULL for non-bool operands #26653
  • Query: Introduce method for providing brackets around SqlExpression b… #26660
